function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Classification of various establishments as ’retailers’ may overlook specific risks associated with different types of businesses, such as healthcare facilities and personal care services.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restricted data collection due to social distancing requirements","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close proximity of residential and commercial areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of different sign types informal vs. professional","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extensive use of paper signs for conveying covid-19 information","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited time to conduct research study involving interviews","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of informal signs may lead to incomplete or unclear communication","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced visibility of tobacco and vaping products may increase the likelihood of teenagers seeking out these products through other means, contributing to the spread of addiction and related health issues.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited time and resources for retailers to react to covid-19 guidelines resulted in challenges in implementing proper health and safety measures, potentially leading to the spread of contagious diseases within retail environments.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prominent in-store signs and displays play a role in shaping consumer behavior and prompting particular actions. if used incorrectly, they may inadvertently encourage behaviors that contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with regulations for social distancing and closure of non-essential services","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Layoffs and remote work due to closure of non-essential services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Messaging on caloric count and food choices in restaurants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness of the term ’social distancing’","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapid change in social behaviors and habits","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowded places and non-essential gatherings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to virtual reality technology in low-income countries due to high cost and computing power requirement.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor internet infrastructure and slow internet speed impeding the full realization of virtual reality technology.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of technical virtual reality experts to develop virtual reality applications suitable for medical education and healthcare.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improperly adjusted head-mounted virtual reality devices causing blurry images and text","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Securing electronic medical records using blockchain","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrinsic experience in a safe virtual environment using blockchain","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integrating point-of-care diagnostics for self-testing of covid-19 patients in isolation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited access to a large covid-19 dataset for training and testing ai models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the potential of blockchain in health systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of autonomous robots in the interconnected iomt infrastructure may lead to bias and breach of privacy in collecting samples from infected patients.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heterogeneous network protocols and smart applications in remote consultation could lead to privacy and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear who regulations and policies on the use of autonomous and unmanned iomt concepts in fighting covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing of covid-19 data may breach privacy and security of the individuals","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy as infection status is shown to all","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis of covid-19 patients lack of quality test","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to spatial covid-19 data for spatial mapping and visualization","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scalability problems with remote consultations and diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns with contact-tracing apps","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regional integration of electronic health records of suspected covid-19 individuals as they travel from one country to the other","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tracking of home-quarantined individuals using gps and mobile phones","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Malicious attack of iomt healthcare equipment","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of personal identification with safety systems could breach privacy and security of health systems.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote collection of covid-19 pandemic data using blockchain records could pose privacy risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of implementing blockchain technology in health systems could lead to security vulnerabilities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 misinformation causing fear and panic","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stigmatization and anxiety related to covid-19","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Generation of noisy data for covid-19","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to detect asymptomatic covid-19 cases in ct images","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent international regulations for covid-19 chest ct image data sharing","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor data quality and sharing in covid-19 chest ct image analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical issues and technology vulnerability","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlapping in the identification of covid-19 cases","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for change of regulations to track contact-persons","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical framework and acceptable use of emerging technologies","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
